docs.title: Welcome to sdm!
docs.text: This package has some functions to create sdms that use remote-sensing data.

docs.title: simple_bbox
docs.text:
In [1]: Copied! 
import sdm

bbox = [-25, 10, -10, 30]
sdm.simple_bbox(bbox, projection='Robinson')
import sdm bbox = [-25, 10, -10, 30] sdm.simple_bbox(bbox, projection='Robinson') In [5]: Copied! 
paceship.simple_bbox(bbox, projection='globe')
paceship.simple_bbox(bbox, projection='globe') In [2]: Copied! 
sdm.simple_bbox(bbox)
sdm.simple_bbox(bbox) In [ ]: Copied!

docs.title: simple_bbox¶
docs.text: Make a map of world with your study area in red.
